meanings.definition: A unit of inductance equal to one thousandth of a henry.
meanings.sent1: I measured the inductance of the coil in millihenries.
meanings.sent2: The circuit required a specific value of millihenries to function properly.
meanings.sent3: When the robot tried to measure the millihenries, it got confused and beeped loudly.
meanings.sent4: The millihenries in the circuit acted like tiny magnets, attracting the metal pieces.
meanings.sent5: The concept of millihenries can be understood by picturing tiny coils inside electronic devices.
